channel.title: Hacking Jetman
channel.description:
You know that game, Jetman, on Facebook. It's a rip-off of the helicopter game, and I just want to poon the score.
Can anyone half-competent with flash take a look at the source and tell me how to poon it? I attached the .fla, just change the extension to .txt.

item.title: Hacking Jetman
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

N00b1:

sorry dude coulnt tell you the as if fucked up when i decom it

Yea… no idea why decompiling rapes the actionscript. Then again I don’t know actionscript, so eh.

therealjdb:

Try using tamper data if it sends it to the server through get or post variables. Then again I know you use opera

Aite it looks pretty legit. I’ll try it later when Jetman comes online.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking Jetman
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

It doesn’t seem to export from .fla to .swf without 100 errors… maybe I’m missing something?

http://s3.amazonaws.com/jetman/jetman_p29.swf

That’s the direct link to the shockwave flash file.

Here’s the rest of the page… it passes variables onto the flash file.

<div id="4243149646_fbswf_473a5f721d1bf" height="300" width="400" overflow="hidden"></div><script type="text/javascript">swf_473a5f721d990 = new SWFObject("http://s3.amazonaws.com/jetman/jetman_p29.swf", "swf_473a5f721d990", "400", "300", "5.0.0", "000000");
swf_473a5f721d990.addParam("align", "center");
swf_473a5f721d990.addParam("salign", "center");
swf_473a5f721d990.addParam("allowScriptAccess", "never");
swf_473a5f721d990.addParam("wmode", "transparent");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("avg", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("userbest", "2173");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("mute", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("mouse", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("bounding", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("character", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_time", "1195007858.1194");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_added", "1");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_user", "1335420482");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_profile_update_time", "1190429730");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_session_key", "d360d1b6022da32703c6a267-1335420482");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_expires", "0");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig_api_key", "c2edcf7d8fdc54be83e49139bfe1258f");
swf_473a5f721d990.addVariable("fb_sig", "a7e1380765aa5381d1fb197392619378");
swf_473a5f721d990.fallback_html = "\x3cdiv class=\x22flash_fallback\x22\x3e\x3cdiv class=\x22flash_fallback_border\x22\x3e\x3cdiv class=\x22flash_fallback_header\x22\x3eFlash Player upgrade required\x3c/div\x3e\x3cdiv class=\x22flash_fallback_explanation\x22\x3eYou must download and install the latest version of the Adobe Flash Player to view this content. \x3c/div\x3e\x3cdiv class=\x22flash_fallback_button\x22\x3e\x3cinput type=\x22button\x22 class=\x22inputbutton\x22 onclick=\x22this.disabled=true;getFlashPlayer();\x22 id=\x22\x22 name=\x22\x22 value=\x22Download Flash\x22 /\x3e\x3c/div\x3e\x3c/div\x3e\x3c/div\x3e";
swf_473a5f721d990.write("4243149646_fbswf_473a5f721d1bf");</script>

Let me know if that makes any sense to you.

Read full topic
